name: Kill Commando - Gold Edition
description:
This is the ultimate final version of Kill Commando!  A single-player FPS made for the fans of Wolfenstein, Doom, Duke Nukem, Shadow Warrior and Redneck Rampage!
Get a copy for free!

The gold edition features:

  • better balancing of difficulties
  • leaner visualization of the number of bullets
  • removed openAl and the corresponding problems
  • smaller size (mp3 and zip-files)
  • faster unpacking
